title: 事隔两年，我终于想通去换头像了~
author: LZX6238
txt_content:
事隔两年，我终于想通去换头像了~

replies.txt_content: 恩。怎没没人接金锭的说

replies.author: LZX6238
replies.txt_content: @geludan  两年了- -

replies.author: zhangyu40177
zhiji
replies.txt_content: 我还是觉得 以前的好点.... 可惜头像上的这孩子了...

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 我的头像已经3年半没换了

replies.author: Lao_Zeng_233
replies.txt_content: 回复接金锭= =

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content: 没见过高富帅发金锭还带概率的>.<

replies.author: 万特第42代
replies.txt_content: 也提醒我该换头像了.看着楼主的头像，真的感觉瘆的慌

replies.author: woyeshirenle
replies.txt_content: 我也顺便水水

replies.author: woyeshirenle
replies.txt_content: 于怒水？？

replies.author: HIJKLMN
replies.txt_content: 这头像……不是高富帅，是屌丝

replies.author: 修改器很好玩
replies.txt_content: 我头像基本每两个星期一换

replies.author: 修改器很好玩
replies.txt_content: 换的频率非常大
我觉得孩子好无辜

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: 呃。。加了几个字母。。没什么大改变，看到这个头像还是知道是同一个人，特别是对以头像认人的人

replies.author: creeper2002
replies.txt_content: 开学的学生党路过。。。

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content: 论坛慢，还没看到更新呢。

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content: 话说好久没见你了，终于出来冒泡了？

replies.author: misaka37586
replies.txt_content: 可怜的孩子...

replies.author: 冰封_King
replies.txt_content: 金锭是我的！
崇拜你，真的，来到MCBBS就一直看你帖子，啊
